data.text: @meghanncuniff I wish republicans had pursued Hilary Clinton’s emails with the same  effectiveness democrats pursue Trump’ s emails to his attorney. How can a judge break the attorney-client privileges without any repercussions❓❓❓
@meghanncuniff @Popehat what’s more embarrassing, asking the court to toss your opponent’s brief for page limits or not knowing that the TOC doesn’t count?

@meghanncuniff Sounds like His Honor takes exactly zero shit, and gives an equal number of fucks.

I like this guy.
@meghanncuniff @LAmag Fascinating life that guy must have

With this late-night filing, it’s not a bad time to share my @LAmag profile on Judge Carter from 2020. All the stuff about the Los Angeles homeless lawsuit is outdated, but the biographical and personality stuff stands. https://t.co/M1edui6OnS https://t.co/jgdP6hSKYW

@jonathan_m_kyle Happy to!! I’ve been covering the OC federal courthouse fir six years so have seen a lot of his hearings and trials and have spent a lot of time with him over coffee and lunch and also touring homeless camps sometimes.
